title: ANDavanai vENDiDuvOm
sahitya:
ANDavanai vENDiDuvOm aNuvAvi malai mEviDum


anupallavi

  kAnbadarkku ezhilOnAi kaNDavarkku eLiyOnAi vENDiDuvOrkk-aruLai viraindE purindiDum


caraNam    tANDavam ADum tillai ANDavanin maindanai mANbuDaiya vaLLiyin manam kavar maNALanai
pUNDA paNDArak-kOlap-pugazhODu tigazhvOnai bhUtala bhaktarukkOr nAthanAgi magizhvOnai
